title: The Unschooled Heart
description: Victorian Romance centred around Lord and Lady Peaton of Highton Manor. With their marriage in turmoil under the strain of Lord James Peaton's excesses, Lady Elizabeth feels stuck with nowhere to turn. To complicate matters still further, her husband fosters an unhealthy interest in the young governess who lives beneath their very roof; Evelyn Scott.As if all this was not bad enough, Lord James also insists on befriending and socialising with Noah Parlow, an ex-Royal Hussar, now crippled, whose station in life falls well below their own. â€‹Is the virtuous Lady Elizabeth doomed to live a life of silence and obedience as society demands? Or does escape come to her, in the most unforeseen of ways?
author: Lillian White
